<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/deletegroup"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Delete group from the datasource. Silently succeeds if group is not present.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Describes the request body of the /deletegroup API call","properties":{"version":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","description":"Version number for document for optimistic concurrency control. If absent or 0 then no version checks are done."},"datasource":{"type":"string","description":"The datasource for which the group is removed"},"groupName":{"description":"the name of the group to be deleted","type":"string"}},"required":["datasource","groupName"],"title":"DeleteGroupRequest"}}},"required":true,"x-exportParamName":"DeleteGroupRequest"}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
